docs.title: Iroh Coin
docs.text: IROH is a memecoin for Iroh, the Australian Shepherd.

docs.title: How to Acquire
docs.text:
Warning

Like any other ERC20 token, you can trade for IROH coins on a decentralized exchange (DEX). But that is not recommended.

Iroh will happily give you coins if he likes you. He like treats, belly-rubs, going to the beach, and playing in the park. Bribery goes a long way with him.

Give him your Ethereum wallet address. Set up your own wallet using the instructions below.

docs.title: Contract Address
docs.text:
IROH is an ERC20 contract on the Ethereum blockchain.

0x0fCEa0D43d8D125fD23D8c6EE048187058D9fe48

View it on the Block Explorer.

docs.title: Instructions
docs.text:
IROH is an ERC20 token that can be viewed in any Web3 app that allows you to manage such tokens.

The following instructions assume you are using the Metamask wallet. Other wallets (like Rabby) should have similar instructions.

  1. Install the Metamask Browser Extension.
  2. Create or import an existing Ethereum wallet.
  3. In the Tokens tab, click the dropdown button on the top-right corner.
  4. Click + Import tokens.
  5. Go to the Custom token tab.
  6. For the Select a network option, select Ethereum Mainnet.
  7. For the Token contract address, copy and paste the contract address.
  8. Click Import and see the confirmation.
  9. Once you get some IROH coins, your balance should automatically update.
